Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Aforementioned \A*fore"men`tioned\, a. Previously mentioned; before-mentioned. --Addison. [1913 Webster]

aforementioned adj : being the one previously mentioned or spoken of; "works of all the aforementioned authors"; "said party has denied the charges" [syn: {aforesaid(a)}, {aforementioned(a)}, {said(a)}]
